articles.title: Jeff Capel's parting gift to Duke's Mike Krzyzewski a symbolic gesture of love, respect - The Fayetteville Observer
articles.description: Before Tuesday's game against Pitt, Jeff Capel presented Duke's Coach K with a steel statue of a clenched fist, a symbolic gesture that represents a 30-year relationship.
articles.content:
PITTSBURGH, PA — Jeff Capel addressed his team a few hours before Pitt's Tuesday night home game against Duke before stepping into an empty room and immediately texting his wife.
"For some reason, I… [+3807 chars]
